vehicles.description: A large truck equipped with a flatbed trailer is parked on the right side of the driveway, facing the same direction, and seems to have reflective warning signs, indicating the presence of a large vehicle.
vehicles.explanation: The position of the truck may obstruct part of our lane, or require our vehicle to adjust its driving path to avoid potential collisions.

vehicles.description: Several cars are parked on the left side of the road, mixed in with the trucks.
vehicles.explanation: These vehicles reduce the available road width, requiring careful driving, especially when car doors are open or pedestrians are weaving through the cars.

traffic lights.description: There are no visible traffic lights in the current image state.
traffic lights.explanation: When there are no traffic signal lights, the vehicle should proceed with caution, comply with standard traffic rules, and yield to any vehicles that have the right of way.

other objects.description: The dim street lighting and the glaring headlights of the oncoming vehicles.
other objects.explanation: Reduced visibility may make it difficult to see road users and traffic control devices. This vehicle must use appropriate lighting and increase vigilance.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, there are several notable elements that influence driving behavior. Firstly, a large truck with a flatbed trailer is parked on the right side of the driveway, facing the same direction as traffic. It has reflective warning signs to alert other road users of its presence. The truck's position may obstruct part of our lane, necessitating an adjustment in the driving path to avoid potential collisions.

Additionally, several cars are parked on the left side of the road, interspersed with the trucks. The presence of these vehicles narrows the available road width, which requires careful navigation. Special attention is needed in case car doors open unexpectedly or pedestrians move between the parked cars.

Although there are no traffic lights visible in the image, this absence means that the vehicle must proceed with caution, adhere to standard traffic rules, and give way to vehicles that have the right of way.

Lastly, the scene includes dim street lighting and the bright headlights from oncoming vehicles, which can significantly reduce visibility. This condition necessitates the use of appropriate vehicle lighting and heightened alertness to safely detect other road users and traffic control devices.

driving_suggestion: In light of the current traffic conditions, autonomous vehicles should maintain a safe following distance from the truck ahead. If the truck partially occupies the driving lane, be prepared to safely adjust the lane position and use appropriate lighting to increase visibility. At the same time, monitor the road conditions, paying attention to other road users or signs not shown in this picture. When passing trucks and cars parked on the left, maintain a cautious speed to ensure there is enough distance to react to their any sudden movements or the potential appearance of pedestrians. Continue to monitor for any irregularities on the road or debris that may be difficult to see immediately due to poor lighting.

1.description and explanation: A construction vehicle is visible; typically, such vehicles are associated with construction activities or road work. In a driving scenario, the presence of a construction vehicle suggests there might be ongoing construction, road work, or possible obstructions ahead. The ego car should remain vigilant, possibly expect reduced lanes or speed limits, and be prepared to conform to road signs or traffic control personnel instructions.

2.description and explanation: A large commercial vehicle designed for transporting goods. Trucks generally require more space to maneuver and have larger blind spots. The ego vehicle should maintain a safe following distance and be cautious when overtaking, as trucks can make sudden turns or stops and might be carrying heavy or unstable loads.
